ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on containing living beings
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:0.5_0: 62. The training rule on containing living beings
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.2_0: the monks from the group of six were using water that they knew contained living beings.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.3_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.4_0: “How can the monks from the group of six use water that they know contains living beings?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.8_0: “... Foolish men, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.10_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.11.1_0: ‘If a monk uses water that he knows contains living beings, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.1.6_0: he knows by himself or others have told him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.1.7_0: If he uses it, knowing that it contains living beings and knowing that they will die if the water is used, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.2.1_0: If it contains living beings, and he perceives it as such, and he uses it, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.2.2_0: If it contains living beings, but he is unsure of it, and he uses it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.2.3_0: If it contains living beings, but he does not perceive it as such, and he uses it, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.2.4_0: If it does not contain living beings, but he perceives it as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.2.5_0: If it does not contain living beings, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.2.6_0: If it does not contain living beings, and he does not perceive it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.3.2_0: if he does not know that it contains living beings;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.3.3_0: if he knows that it does not contain living beings;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.3.4_0: if he uses it knowing that they will not die;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.3.7_0: The second rule, the training rule on containing living beings, is finished.
